name: SWOT
description: SWOT template for use in student group projects.
intro:
The board has four columns: Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, and Threats. These help you analyse internal and external factors affecting a project, organisation, or situation.

Think about the topic we're analysing and add each idea on a note.

Place your notes in the relevant column. Read and discuss them together. Combine similar ideas and ask clarifying questions.
